sourcesContent: import {withRouter} from 'react-router-dom' import Popup from 'reactjs-popup' import Cookies from 'js-cookie' import 'reactjs-popup/dist/index.css' import {FiLogOut} from 'react-icons/fi' import ModeContext from '../../context/ModeContext' import { PopupContainer, PopupCard, Buttons, CancelBtn, ConfirmBtn, Logout, LogoutBtn, Paragraph, } from './styledComponents' const LogoutPopup = props => { const logoutBtn = () => { const {history} = props Cookies.remove('jwt_token') history.replace('/login') } return ( {value => { const {darkMode} = value return ( Logout } > {close => ( <> Are you sure, you want to logout close()} type="button"> Cancel Confirm )} ) }} ) } export default withRouter(LogoutPopup)
